Name: Large Language Models
Description: Machine learning models capable of generating written text in a human-like manner. GPT-3.5, GPT-4, Bard, Claude 2, LLAMA.

Name: Machine Translation
Description: Software that automatically translates text from one language to another. <https://www.deepl.com>

Name: Social Media Management and Monitoring
Description: Analysiere und verstehe deine Wirkung in sozialen Medien.

Name: Facial Recognition
Description: Software that can measure the similarity of faces from images or video, thus recognizing faces. <http://clearview.ai> <https://pimeyes.com>

Name: Latent Diffusion Models
Description: Neural network models that allows high resolution image synthesis using less resources than other methods (GAN, VAE, ARM). Can generate images from text input, remove objects on images. GitHub - CompVis/latent-diffusion: High-Resolution Image Synthesis with Latent Diffusion Models.

Name: AutoML
Description: Der Hauptvorteil von Auto-ML liegt in der Zeitersparnis bei der Datenverarbeitung und den Testphasen, die notwendig sind, um ein ausreichend leistungsfähiges (AI) Modell in Betrieb zu nehmen.

Name: speech2text
Description: Machine learning models that convert speech of various languages to text. Speech2Text-App

Name: text2speech
Description: Software that generates speech from written text which sounds like (interesting) human beings. <https://openai.com/blog/chatgpt-can-now-see-hear-and-speak>

Name: AGI
Description: Artificial General Intelligence. A hypothetical type of intelligent agent that can learn to accomplish any intellectual task that human beings or animals can perform.

Name: Superintelligence
Description: A hypothetical agent or system that possesses intelligence far surpassing that of the brightest and most gifted human minds in virtually all domains of interest.

Name: Large Multimodal Models
Description: Large Multimodal Models (LMM) are advanced artificial intelligence systems that can process and generate information from multiple types of data, such as text, images, audio, and video, using powerful pre-trained language models as a core component.

Name: Real time speech translation
Description: Tools using Neural machine translation (NTM) allows to translate instantly speech in one language to another. Example: SpeechTrans

Name: TikTok
Description: Social media platform based on creating, watching and sharing short videos. TikTok - Make Your Day

Name: Realistic Metaverse Avatars
Description: Refer to interview Mark Zuckerberg on Lex Fridman.

Name: Atlassian Software
Description: Jira, Confluence, Bitbucket are useful technologies, tools for planning, tracking, work organization, document creation, and/or collaborate on code. Products | Atlassian

Name: GPU-Clusters
Description: Computer cluster where each node (at least some) will be equipped with Graphics Processing Unit. Useful for AI analysis. Examples: AWS and NVIDIA (amazon.com), Google Cloud.

Name: ML-Workbench
Description: Gleich wie ML-Auto

Name: Data Virtualization
Description: Technology that allows to produce interactive data visualization. It is then possible to explore the data in more detail, highlight specific points, and customize the way it is represented. (Power BI, Tableau, Klipfolio, Qlik Sense,…) Microsoft Power BI

Name: Biomolecular data storage
Description: Store Data in DNA is a promising way. DNA can store a density of 10¹⁹ bits of data per cm3 which is way higher than the actual storage methods. The data will be stored according to the binary code where for instance 00 -> A, 01 -> C, 10 -> G and T -> 11. DNA will be sequenced through NGS (Illumina). BioTech | Free Full-Text | DNA Data Storage (mdpi.com)

Name: Robotics
Description: Automation of tasks, e.g. milking robots, cleaning systems, feeding

Name: Weeding robots
Description: Intelligentes Sprühen für lokale Behandlungen Ihrer Reihenkulturen, Gräser und Rasenflächen

Name: Variable rate fertilization
Description: Gleich aber für Düngung

Name: Next generation sequencing
Description: Technology used to sequence DNA, RNA. Can be used in several fields like the study of seeds and plant varieties, GMO control. Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS) | Explore the technology (illumina.com)

Name: UAV imaging
Description: Luftbildaufnahmen durch Drohnen. Können dazu verwendet werden, Wasserstress zu erkennen oder Nährstoffkarten zu erstellen.

Name: Satellite imaging
Description: Use cases such as determining the vegetation cover period by satellite data.

Name: Open government data
Description: Governmental data that is openly accessible to the public. In Switzerland, available open government data is listed on opendata.swiss.

Name: Resource Description Framework
Description: Framework to represent interconnected data on the web (semantic web). Used as standard to describe and visualize metadata.

Name: Linked open data
Description: Linked Open Data is a way of publishing and connecting data on the web using open standards and URIs such that it can be easily accessed, queried, and enriched by humans and machines.

Name: Green-IT
Description: Lösungen zu schaffen und aufzubauen, die Auswirkungen menschlicher Aktivitäten auf die Umwelt zu verringern oder andere umweltfreundliche Maßnahmen im IT-Bereich zu ergreifen.

Name: ESG
Description: Betrachtet verschiedenen Investitionsmöglichkeiten als auch unnötige Risiken um sie zu vermeiden

Name: visualize.admin.ch
Description: Visualization tool of OGD data on LINDAS: visualize.admin.ch

Name: i14y
Description: Interoperability platform. Switzerland’s national data catalogue

Name: Vertical farming
Description: Producing plants in a tightly controlled environment. Decisions about ressources are data driven.

Name: IoT
Description: Network of devices that collect data.

Name: Digital twin
Description: Virtual representation of a system (e.g. farm) based on sensors and real-time data to make data-driven decisions

Name: Multi-stakeholder platforms
Description: Agridata (data exchange platform)

Name: smart farming/farm automation
Description: Diverse set of strategies to make informed decisions and to automate processes in agricultural businesses: Versuchsstation Smarte Technologien in der Landwirtschaft (admin.ch)
